participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to train my dog so that we can go on longer hikes together.
My parents are very supportive of my decision to take a break from work to focus on my family.
My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.
I remember singing along to Queens of the Stone Age with my sisters in the car on long road trips.
i drink coffee every day.

participant_2.background:
I live on a farm with my mom who works in telecommunications.
i am a musician.
i have a marketing job.
My favorite music is techno, it helps me get in the zone for my workouts.
i am funny.

content.text: Hey! I am really excited to get back into hiking. I would love to find a hiking buddy if you're interested.
Hi! I'm into hiking too! I'm looking for a hiking buddy as well. Where do you usually go hiking?
I usually go hiking in the local mountains. I just moved here, so I'm not too familiar with the trails yet.
Oh, cool! I live on a farm with my mom, so I know all the best trails around here.
That's awesome! Do you have any dogs? I have a dog that I love to take hiking with me.
No, I don't have any dogs. I'm a musician and I don't have much time for pets.
Oh, that's too bad. I love dogs. They're the best hiking companions.
I know, right? I wish I had a dog.
Well, maybe we can start a dog hiking group!
That's a great idea! I'd be down for that.
Awesome! I'll start a Facebook group and we can invite all our friends to join.
Sounds good! I can't wait to start hiking with you.
Me too! It's gonna be a lot of fun.
